short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter YouTube videos by their duration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your YouTube with Longform YouTube Filter. This extension filters videos by length, helping you hide shorts or any video that doesn't meet your duration criteria. Customize your feed to focus on the content that matters to you.

Key Features:
Remove Shorts: Hide YouTube shorts for a focus on longer videos.
Filter by Duration: Set minimum and maximum video lengths to match your preferences.
User-friendly Interface: Easily set and customize your filter settings.
Real-time Statistics: Track the number of actively blocked videos and their combined duration in the popup.

How to Use:
1. Enable the Filter: Check 'Enable Filter' to activate the extension.
2. Set Duration Preferences: Use sliders or input boxes for minimum and maximum video lengths.
3. Remove Shorts: Optionally, check 'Remove Shorts' to hide all YouTube shorts.
4. Enjoy a Customized Feed: Your YouTube feed will show only the videos you want.

Why Use Longform YouTube Filter?
Enhanced Focus: Avoid distractions from short videos.
Time Management: Focus on longer, more detailed content.
